name: Vanta
description: Trust management platform — SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA compliance automation with AI-native integrations

tools: list_failing_tests — List tests that are currently failing
get_remediation — Get remediation guidance for failing tests
list_evidence — List evidence items and collection status

setup_steps: 2. Create API token or configure OAuth 2.0 app
3. Scope: Compliance Reader (or Compliance Admin for remediation actions)
4. Connect Vanta integrations (AWS, GitHub, etc.) for automated evidence
security_notes: Vanta supports OAuth 2.0 — preferred over API tokens
Remediation write access should be carefully scoped
Compliance data is audit-sensitive — log all MCP access
Pair with Prowler MCP to cross-reference cloud findings with Vanta controls
